text: 23.9: FG 5.39; 22.7; 22.17-18; 25.25Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap, ne nzuav khɨrɨv kaav nzuai. Mba Zudaiŋ tɨvi kaŋgi gumgi mbari, mbe vhɨra Fherasi gumgi ma. Mbe thɨvgia khaŋ tɨga havhargiap khaŋ nzuai, “Nza kha guma garim, ana bigɨna mbatɨga thueŋ muuŋgi fhuvara. Ana ŋina the ana suaŋgim, ana nzuai o, Fhe Bakɨme enser the ana suaŋgim, ana nzuai thi?”
